doc.name: tabKey
doc.summary: Sent when the user presses the Tab key.

examples.example:
on tabKey -- go forward in stack on tab, backward on shift-tab
if the shiftKey is down then go previous card
else go next card
end tabKey

description.p: Handle the tabKey message when you want to perform an action (such as going to the next card) when the user presses the Tab key.
The message is sent to the active (focused) control, or to the current card if no control is focused.
